Our Second Page
=================================

.. note::
    This is an example of a note admonition in our *Sphinx documentation*

.. warning::
    This is a **warning** admonition

.. error:: 
    This is an example **error** message

.. admonition:: Custom Title

    This is a custom admonition block

.. code-block:: bash

    echo "Hi, this is code-block for bash!"

.. tabs:: lang

    .. code-tab:: python

        print("This is code-tab for python")
        print("This is after sphinx-autobuild")

    .. code-tab:: bash

        echo "This is code-tab for bash"

    .. code-tab:: golang
        
        fmt.Println("This is code-tab for golang")
